# Breaking Changes

> Breaking changes and behavioral differences between .NET versions that may affect application upgrades. Each major version documents API changes, obsoletions, and removed features. Check compatibility documentation before upgrading; use analyzers to detect usage of obsolete APIs.

*Topics available: 537*

- [Breaking changes in .NET 10](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/10.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 10.
- [Breaking changes in .NET 11](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/11.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 11.
- [Breaking changes in .NET Core 2.1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/2.1.md): Lists the breaking changes in version 2.1 of .NET Core.
- [Breaking changes in .NET Core 3.0](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/3.0.md): Lists the breaking changes in version 3.0 of .NET Core, ASP.NET Core, and EF Core.
- [Breaking changes in .NET Core 3.1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/3.1.md): Lists the breaking changes in version 3.1 of .NET Core and ASP.NET Core.
- [Breaking changes in .NET 5](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/5.0.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 5.
- [Breaking changes in .NET 6](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/6.0.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 6.
- [Breaking changes in .NET 7](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/7.0.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 7.
- [Breaking changes in .NET 8](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/8.0.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 8.
- [Breaking changes in .NET 9](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/9.0.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 9.
- [API removal in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/api-removal.md): Learn about .NET's policy for obsoleting and removing APIs.
- [.NET breaking changes reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/breaking-changes.md): Learn how to navigate the .NET breaking changes reference.
- [Compatibility](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/categories.md): Learn about the ways in which code changes can affect compatibility in .NET.
- [Breaking changes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/fx-core.md): Lists the breaking changes from .NET Framework to .NET Core 1.0 - 3.1.
- [.NET API changes that affect compatibility](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/library-change-rules.md): Learn how .NET attempts to maintain compatibility for developers across .NET versions, and what kind of change is considered a breaking change.
- [Unsupported APIs on .NET Core and .NET 5+](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/unsupported-apis.md): Learn which .NET APIs always throw an exception on .NET Core and .NET 5 and later versions.
